page.title: 02WHERE PEOPLE WORK
page.content: {EMPLOYMENT} We did a survey to see where our Dad's and Mom's (Skethley Estate) worked. We repeated it at Westfield School (council estate near Hinckley). {LOCATION SKETCHLEY WESTFIELD { M. F. M. F. Not working 2 70 17 43 Hinckley 61 59 62 89 Burbage 3 27 5 0 Coventry 45 4 21 0 Leicester 31 6 14 1 Nuneaton 14 5 13 1 Home 4 { 33 } 0 { 12 Other < 10miles 22 4 10 1 Other > 10miles 17{ } 4 5 0 {-------------------------------------- The mother's employment includes full and part time. At Sketchley there were 31 f/time: 111 p/time: 70 not working. At Westfield 41f/time: 70 p/time:43not working.{NOTE OUTWORKERS AT HOME
